Name: Event Tracing - Register an ETW manifest
Author: HumanPrinter

Parameters.Name: ManifestFile
Parameters.Label: Manifest file
Parameters.HelpText: Full path to the manifest file that must be registered.

Parameters.Name: ResourceFile
Parameters.Label: Resource file
Parameters.HelpText: The full path to the assembly that must be used as resource file.

Parameters.Name: MessageFile
Parameters.Label: Message file
Parameters.HelpText: The full path to the assembly that must be used as message file.
